description: A production-ready workflow management system to manage the full lifecycle of purchasing activities: from requisition through supplier selection, PO creation, goods receipt, invoice verification and payment, to close & archive. Designed for enterprise scale with master-data driven lookups and full stage tracking (planned, actual, delay) for auditing and SLA monitoring.

sheets.name: Procurement Main Workflow

columns.name: Serial No
columns.description: Sequential serial number for sheet rows

columns.name: Item Summary
columns.description: Brief summary of items or services requested

columns.name: Total Estimated Value
columns.description: Estimated total value of the procurement

columns.name: Delay1
columns.description: Delay for Stage 1: Actual1 - Planned1 (days) or blank until Actual1 present

columns.name: PR Line Items Summary
columns.description: Condensed description of PR line items

columns.name: Approval Role
columns.description: Role that performed approval (e.g., Manager / Finance)

columns.name: RFQ Sent To Vendor IDs
columns.description: List of vendor IDs RFQ was sent to (lookup to Supplier Master)

columns.name: Quotation Notes
columns.description: Notes about quotations received or required

columns.name: Final Supplier Quote Value
columns.description: Final quoted value from selected supplier

columns.name: PO Terms  Delivery
columns.description: Key PO terms and delivery instructions

columns.name: Supplier Acknowledgement No
columns.description: Supplier acknowledgement or order confirmation number

columns.name: Expected Delivery Date
columns.description: Expected delivery date provided by supplier

columns.name: Closure Notes
columns.description: Final closure comments and lessons learned

columns.name: Archive Location  Link
columns.description: Link or path to archived documents

columns.name: Last Updated By
columns.description: User who last updated the row

stages.stage_description: Requisition raised by requester specifying items, quantities and required-by dates.
Request for quotations and receipt of vendor proposals.
Evaluate quotes, negotiate terms and select preferred supplier.
Create purchase order document and communicate to supplier.
Approval of generated PO by authorized approvers.
Supplier acknowledges the order and confirms dispatch details.
Receive goods/services, record GRN, and perform inspection.
Match invoice to PO and GRN, resolve variances and approve invoice for payment.
Process payment based on approved invoice: scheduling and execution of payment.
Final closure, archival of documents and lessons learned capture.

sheets.description: Primary workflow sheet that tracks each procurement request and its progression through all purchase management stages. Every stage block contains Planned{N}, Actual{N}, Delay{N} as the first three columns of that stage block.

sheets.name: Supplier Master
sheets.description: Reference data for suppliers/vendor records and lookup values.

sheets.name: Item Master
sheets.description: Catalog of purchasable items and services used for lookups and validation.

sheets.name: Department Master
sheets.description: Reference for departments and cost centers.

sheets.name: Currency Master
sheets.description: Supported currency codes and exchange meta-data.

sheets.name: Payment Terms Master
sheets.description: Standard payment term definitions and mapping.

sheets.name: GL Account Master
sheets.description: General ledger account reference for charge coding.

sheets.name: Import Dump
sheets.description: Utility sheet to import/export bulk procurement rows or master updates.
